profileText: a Representative from Texas; born in Texas, May 4, 1967; graduated from Levelland High School, Levelland, Tex., 1985; A.S., South Plains College, Levelland, Tex., 1988; B.S., Texas Agricultural and Mechanical University, Galveston, Tex., 1991; M.D., University of Texas Medical Branch, Galveston, Tex., 1995; United States Navy Reserve, 1991-1995; United States Navy, 1995–2019, rear admiral; physician, White House Medical Unit, 2006-2018 ; Physician to the President, 2013–2018; Assistant to the President and Chief Medical Advisor, Executive Office of the President, Donald J. Trump, 2019; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2021-present).
